alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:41PM MDT until July 28 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 241 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elbert, or 29 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kiowa around 300 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
